mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T03_GEN_MEMBER ( GEN_ID , PER_ID , FAR_ID , MOT_ID ) VALUES ( #{gENID} , #{pERID} , #{fARID} , #{mOTID} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T03_GEN_MEMBER SET GEN_ID = #{gENID} , PER_ID = #{pERID} , FAR_ID = #{fARID} , MOT_ID = #{mOTID} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , GEN_ID AS "gENID" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , FAR_ID AS "fARID" , MOT_ID AS "mOTID" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{iD}
SELECT ID AS "iD" , GEN_ID AS "gENID" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , FAR_ID AS "fARID" , MOT_ID AS "mOTID" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE
